casebody.data:
Reuben Nathaniel WRIGHT, Appellant-Defendant,
v.
STATE of Indiana, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-CR-1485 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED December 27, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

SHARPNACK , Sr.J. Reversed and remanded. NAJAM, J., Concurs.

CRONE, J., Concurs.
